# Greetings from The On-Line Encyclopedia of Integer Sequences! http://oeis.org/

Search: id:a001418
Showing 1-1 of 1

%I A001418 M4587 N1956 #37 Feb 16 2025 08:32:23
%S A001418 1,8,1368,300608,186086600,123912532224,129950723279272
%N A001418 Number of ways of folding an n X n sheet of stamps.
%D A001418 N. J. A. Sloane, A Handbook of Integer Sequences, Academic Press, 1973 (includes this sequence).
%D A001418 N. J. A. Sloane and Simon Plouffe, The Encyclopedia of Integer Sequences, Academic Press, 1995 (includes this sequence).
%H A001418 W. F. Lunnon, <a href="http://dx.doi.org/10.1093/comjnl/14.1.75">Multi-dimensional map-folding</a>, Computer Journal 14 1971 75-80.
%H A001418 Eric Weisstein's World of Mathematics, <a href="https://mathworld.wolfram.com/MapFolding.html">Map Folding</a>.
%H A001418 <a href="/index/Fo#fold">Index entries for sequences obtained by enumerating foldings</a>.
%e A001418 For n = 2 the a(2) = 8 foldings of a sheet labeled 1234 in reading order are 1243, 1342, 2134, 2431, 3124, 3421, 4213, 4312.
%Y A001418 Cf. A000136, A000560, A001417, A195646.
%K A001418 nonn,hard,more
%O A001418 1,2
%A A001418 _N. J. A. Sloane_
%E A001418 a(6)-a(7) from _Sean A. Irvine_, Jan 11 2018
%E A001418 Offset corrected by _Anders Kaseorg_, Nov 29 2024
